contents.text: Bill brings his niece Claire to a party . Now he is introducing Claire to one of his colleagues , Dan .
contents.text_zh: 比尔将他的侄女克菜尔带到派对上，现在他正在向他的同事丹介绍克莱尔。

contents.text: Super! Let me introduce you to my niece. Claire Claire . this is Dan—he works with me at the office .
contents.text_zh: 棒极了！让我来向你介绍我的侄女，克莱尔。克莱尔，这是丹，他和我一个办公室工作。

contents.text: Dan , this is my brother John’s daughter, Claire .
contents.text_zh: 丹，这是哥哥的侄女，克莱尔。

contents.text: Pleased to meet you . I didn’ t know John had a daughter ? Where’s he been hiding you ?
contents.text_zh: 很高兴见到你，我从来不知道约翰还有个女儿。他一直把你藏在哪儿了？

contents.text: She’s been living out East with one of her aunts . She just moved back .
contents.text_zh: 她一直和她的阿姨住在东部，她才刚刚搬回来。

contents.text: What part of the East, Claire ?
It must be quite a change— coming back here?
contents.text_zh: 那你回来之后肯定觉得变化很大吧？

contents.text: It is , but I’m glad to be back and see all my friends .
contents.text_zh: 是的，但是我很高兴回到这看我的朋友们。

contents.text: Hey ,Dan . Do you still play golf ？
Not as much as I would like .
Claire plays . Maybe we could all play sometime soon ?
contents.text_zh: 克莱尔喜欢打。也许我们可以找个时间一起打？

contents.text: That sounds great . How about tomorrow morning ?
Sure , say 7:00, out at Harrison Park ?
contents.text_zh: 比尔和克菜尔：好，7点，在哈里森公园外。

contents.text: Great ,7 a.m . at Harrison .I’ll look forward to it .
contents.text_zh: 太棒了，早上7点，在哈里森，真期待啊！
